struct.name: quiet_ofdm_options
struct.doc: These options configure the behavior of OFDM, orthogonal frequency division multiplexing, as used by the encoder. OFDM places the modulated symbols on to multiple orthogonal subcarriers. This can help the decoder estabilish good equalization when used on a system with uneven filtering.

field.name: num_subcarriers
field.brief: total number of subcarriers used, inlcuding guard bands and pilots

field.name: cyclic_prefix_len
field.brief: number of cyclic prefix samples between symbols

field.name: taper_len
field.brief: number of taper window between symbols

field.name: left_band
field.brief: number of extra guard subcarriers inserted on left (low freq)

field.name: right_band
field.brief: number of extra guard subcarriers inserted on right (high freq)
